Translations.Text: Do you not see those who, in exchange for God's favor, offer only ingratitude and make their people end up in the home of ruin
Hell, where they will roast? What an evil place to be in
They claimed that there are powers that could rival God, and so they strayed from His path. Say, "Enjoy yourselves, for your destination is the Fire

Tell My worshipers who believe that they should perform the prayer and give secretly and openly, out of what We provide for them as sustenance. There will come a Day when there will be no bargaining, and no friendship

It is God Who has created the heavens and the earth, and Who sends down water from the sky and brings forth fruit for your sustenance. He has made the ships useful to you, so that you may sail though the sea at His command and has made the rivers useful to you
He has made the sun and the moon-- both of them constant in their courses-- useful to you and has made the night and the day useful to you

He has given you some of everything for which you asked Him for. If you tried to count God's blessings, you could never do it. Human beings are most persistent in wrongdoing and in their rejection of the truth
